Class LaddersAndSnakes

java.lang.Object
LaddersAndSnakes
public class LaddersAndSnakes
extends java.lang.Object
The class that runs the entire game. handles manipulating the players and thier positions.

    This is the constructor for this class, it intializes all the variables.

    • flipDice

      public static int flipDice​(int n)
      this method rolls a virtual dice within the range of 1 to n.
      Parameters:
      n - intializes the upperlimit of the dice roll.
      Returns:
      returns the final dice roll number.

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition​(Player p)
      Positions the player on the board based on their current position.
      Parameters:
      p - , the current player who's position is being set.

    • printChars

      public java.lang.String printChars​(int n)
      Prints out the first letter of the player on the board to create a visual representation of where the players are, thereby creating a visual interface.
      Parameters:
      n - , indicates the position on the board where the player will be positioned. Its also important to note that this method is alos able to determine how many people are on this position and will print all of them.
      Returns:
      returns the first letter of all the players who might be on that position.

    • setPlayerNames

      public void setPlayerNames​(int n)
      Sets the player names and also catches any invalid inputs like numbers.
      Parameters:
      n - , limits the loop to the amount of players.

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers​(java.lang.String name)
      Declares new players and adds them to the arraylist that stores all the players.
      Parameters:
      name - , constructs the player with this string.

    • getPlayers

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public static int setNumOfPlayers()
      A method to determine the number of players that are playing the game. This method also prevents the user from inputting the wrong input.
      Returns:
      returns the number of players determined by the method.

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard​(char[][] list)
      Declares a new board, the purpose of this is to erase the old positions, so that the new positions can be set. if this was not done, then the board would save all the positions of all the players throughout the duration of the game.
      Parameters:
      list - , replaces the board with this new 2d array.

    • play

      public void play()
      runs the bulk of the game, mainly handles the rolling of the dice and displaying of the board with the updated positions.

      Returns the board. Is a basic get method.
      Returns:

    • whosFirst

      public void whosFirst()
      this method determines the order of the players based on who rolls a 6, and then a 5 etc, until only 1 player remains which it automatically sets as the last player.

    • ladderOrSnake

      public void ladderOrSnake​(Player p)
      This switch case determines where a player goes if they land on a ladder or snake.
      Parameters:
      p - takes the players position and sets it to the new position based on where they landed.
